name: Chairlift Snowy Ride
description: Get ready to play the most excited, wonderful, and full of thrill ride in chairlift  game. Control the chairlift for tourist to have enjoyed a tourist trip. This is one of the best and new kind of simulator games.Hill,snowy environment  make game more adventure. Show your best cable car operator skills and drive your chair lifts fast. But be careful there are some sharp turns in your way you have to slow down your chair lift to avoid any accident. Drive your cable car across vast and beautifully designed environments. Reach the destinations carefully.  This simulator is designed to give you the real experience of having to drive a chairlift . Christmas Gift here. Just pick and enjoy. Best of Luck!
